## Pokemons
```{python}
import pandas as pd
pokemon=pd.read_csv("../data/Pokemon.csv")
print(pokemon.head())
pokemon=pokemon[pokemon["Generation"]==1]
pokemon=pokemon[["Type 1","Type 2","Speed"]]
print(pokemon.shape)
pokemon=pokemon.dropna() # Limpieza datos
print(pokemon.shape)
```

## Versi√≥n hacia python
```{r}
pokemon2 = read.csv("../data/Pokemon.csv",header=TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
pokemon2 <- pokemon2 %>% 
  filter(Generation==1) %>% 
  select(Type.1,Type.2,Speed) %>% 
  na.omit()
summary(pokemon2)
```
